price: E quem melhor, em dito, que aquele que convoca os homens a Allah e faz o bem e diz: "Por certo, sou dos submissos?"
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ قَوۡلٗا مِّمَّن دَعَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا وَقَالَ إِنَّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waman aḥsanu qawlan mimman daʿā ilā al-lahi waʿamila ṣāliḥan waqāla innanī mina al-mus'limīna
